messages.subject: Another introduction
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/31/02 6:21:48 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/31/02 6:21:48 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Ren, I did meet you briefly. You set me up with your unschooling friend
Alice in North Carolina. >>

AH!! I even remember your face, I thought you looked familiar. So glad you
met Alice!!

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Another introduction

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/30/2002 11:45:24 AM Eastern Standard Time,
ikonstitcher@... writes:


> > No, but there's this neat bumper sticker I saw on several cars :)
> > Anne Ohman at the unschooling.com message boards sells it.
>

>

Let me go look.... <g>


Free to Think, Learn, Do and BE
Learning through Life, Joyfully!
Unschooling.com

~K

messages.subject: Another introduction
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/30/02 5:45:50 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:  No, but there s this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/30/02 5:45:50 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Is there a secret handshake? >>

No, but there's this neat bumper sticker I saw on several cars :)
Anne Ohman at the unschooling.com message boards sells it. I got all excited
when I went to Jacksonville to stay with an unschooler and when they drove up
there was the sticker!! I knew I'd found friends immedietly.....

Anyway, welcome. I probably met you at the conference too but a lot of faces
are a blur (I was chasing Jalen too much to slow down )

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
